title: Multiway and two-way selection - compare segments

content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the outputs of the two code segments?

choices.label: Code segment I and code segment II produce the same output for all values of x and y.
Code segment I and code segment II produce the same output only when x is equal to y.
Code segment I and code segment II produce the same output only when x is not equal to y.
Code segment I and code segment II produce the same output only when x is less than y.

content.answer: Code segment I and code segment II produce the same output for all values of x and y.
